text: Thadeus Wierucki (23 December 1934 - 8 March 2015) was a Belgian professional racing cyclist. He rode in the 1959 and the 1960 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Liège Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Thadeus Wierucki
